name: mico
description: A lightweight and versatile CSS framework

scripts.build: node scripts/cleanup-components.js && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.preview: echo "Use a local server to preview the built files in the dist directory"
scripts.build:css: npm run clean && npm run ensure-dirs && postcss css/mico.css -o dist/css/mico.min.css --env production && postcss css/mico.css -o dist/css/mico.css --env development && node scripts/copy-theme.js
scripts.ensure-dirs: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const dirs = ['dist/css', 'dist/css/themes', 'dist/js']; dirs.forEach(dir => { if (!fs.existsSync(dir)) fs.mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true }); });"
scripts.test:visual: echo "Visual regression tests would run here"
scripts.demo: npm run build && npm run serve

author: Michael Katiba
